nodes.title: 0. Understand the concept of graph theory
nodes.desc: Recognize the importance of graph theory in computer science and mathematics, with applications in network analysis, optimization, and more. [GeeksforGeeks](https://www.geeksforgegeeks.org/graph-theory/)

nodes.title: 1. Learn about graph representations
nodes.desc: Study the different ways to represent graphs, including adjacency matrices, adjacency lists, and edge lists. [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_representation)

nodes.title: 10. Learn about graph clustering
nodes.desc: Study the different graph clustering algorithms, including k-means clustering and hierarchical clustering. [GeeksforGeeks](https://www.geeksforgegeeks.org/graph-clustering/)

nodes.title: 11. Understand graph community detection
nodes.desc: Learn about the different graph community detection algorithms, including modularity-based clustering and spectral clustering. [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Community_detection)

nodes.title: 12. Study graph neural networks
nodes.desc: Learn about the different graph neural network architectures, including Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs) and Graph Attention Networks (GATs). [arXiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/1806.01261)

nodes.title: 13. Learn about graph-based recommender systems
nodes.desc: Study the different graph-based recommender system algorithms, including collaborative filtering and content-based filtering. [GeeksforGeeks](https://www.geeksforgegeeks.org/graph-based-recommender-systems/)

nodes.title: 14. Understand graph-based natural language processing
nodes.desc: Learn about the different graph-based natural language processing algorithms, including graph-based parsing and graph-based machine translation. [ACL Anthology](https://www.aclweb.org/anthology/)

nodes.title: 15. Study graph-based computer vision
nodes.desc: Learn about the different graph-based computer vision algorithms, including graph-based image segmentation and graph-based object detection. [CVPR](https://cvpr2020.thecvf.com/)

nodes.title: 16. Learn about graph-based robotics
nodes.desc: Study the different graph-based robotics algorithms, including graph-based motion planning and graph-based control. [ICRA](https://www.icra2020.org/)

nodes.title: 17. Understand graph-based biology
nodes.desc: Learn about the different graph-based biology algorithms, including graph-based genomics and graph-based proteomics. [Bioinformatics](https://academic.oup.com/bioinformatics)

nodes.title: 18. Study graph-based chemistry
nodes.desc: Learn about the different graph-based chemistry algorithms, including graph-based molecular modeling and graph-based chemical reaction prediction. [Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling](https://pubs.acs.org/journal/jcisd8)

nodes.title: 19. Learn about graph-based physics
nodes.desc: Study the different graph-based physics algorithms, including graph-based quantum mechanics and graph-based statistical mechanics. [Physical Review X](https://journals.aps.org/prx/)

nodes.title: 2. Understand graph traversal algorithms
nodes.desc: Learn about algorithms such as Breadth-First Search (BFS) and Depth-First Search (DFS) to traverse graphs. [LeetCode](https://leetcode.com/explore/learn/card/graph/)

nodes.title: 20. Understand graph-based engineering
nodes.desc: Learn about the different graph-based engineering algorithms, including graph-based structural analysis and graph-based control systems. [Journal of Engineering Mechanics](https://ascelibrary.org/journal/jenmea)

nodes.title: 21. Study graph-based economics
nodes.desc: Learn about the different graph-based economics algorithms, including graph-based network economics and graph-based game theory. [Journal of Economic Theory](https://www.journals.elsevier.com/journal-of-economic-theory/)

nodes.title: 22. Learn about graph-based social sciences
nodes.desc: Study the different graph-based social sciences algorithms, including graph-based social network analysis and graph-based opinion dynamics. [Social Networks](https://www.journals.elsevier.com/social-networks/)

nodes.title: 23. Understand graph-based environmental science
nodes.desc: Learn about the different graph-based environmental science algorithms, including graph-based climate modeling and graph-based ecosystem analysis. [Environmental Research Letters](https://iopscience.iop.org/journal/1748-9326)

nodes.title: 24. Study graph-based neuroscience
nodes.desc: Learn about the different graph-based neuroscience algorithms, including graph-based brain network analysis and graph-based neural decoding. [Neuron](https://www.cell.com/neuron/)

nodes.title: 3. Study graph connectivity
nodes.desc: Understand the concepts of connectedness, strongly connectedness, and weakly connectedness in graphs. [MathWorld](https://mathworld.wolfram.com/ConnectedGraph.html)

nodes.title: 4. Learn about graph cycles
nodes.desc: Study the different types of cycles in graphs, including Hamiltonian cycles and Eulerian cycles. [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cycle_(graph_theory))

nodes.title: 5. Understand graph coloring
nodes.desc: Learn about the different graph coloring problems, including vertex coloring and edge coloring. [GeeksforGeeks](https://www.geeksforgegeeks.org/graph-coloring/)

nodes.title: 6. Study graph matching
nodes.desc: Learn about the different graph matching problems, including maximum matching and minimum matching. [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matching_(graph_theory))

nodes.title: 7. Learn about graph optimization
nodes.desc: Study the different graph optimization problems, including shortest paths and minimum spanning trees. [LeetCode](https://leetcode.com/explore/learn/card/graph/)

nodes.title: 8. Understand graph planarity
nodes.desc: Learn about the concept of planarity in graphs and the different planarity testing algorithms. [MathWorld](https://mathworld.wolfram.com/PlanarGraph.html)

nodes.title: 9. Study graph isomorphism
nodes.desc: Learn about the different graph isomorphism problems, including graph isomorphism testing and graph canonization. [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Graph_isomorphism)
